titleStmt.title: A full and true account of the tryal, conviction, & condemnatio[n] of the Scotch rebels officers in the L. Dunbarton's regiment; at Bury St. Edmunds in Suffolk, (on Wednesday, July 31st, 1689.) For high-treason. Licens'd, according to order, 1689.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for J. Pardo in St. James's-street,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; item cropped with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
